pullrequest.title: Static camera when following a model

content.raw:
Could you change it to something like this: "If set to true, the position of the camera is relative to the tracked model, otherwise it's relative to the world origin. In either case, the track position is expressed in the world frame."

Not sure how clear that is though.
content.html:
Could you change it to something like this: "If set to true, the position of the camera is relative to the tracked model, otherwise it's relative to the world origin. In either case, the track position is expressed in the world frame."

Not sure how clear that is though.
